metadata.title: CVE-2023-33466 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Orthanc before 1.12.0 allows authenticated users with access to the OrthancAPI to overwrite arbitrary files on the file system, and in specificdeployment scenarios allows the attacker to overwrite the configuration,which can be exploited to trigger Remote Code Execution (RCE).

criterions.comment: orthanc package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
